title: 1050 The 7 Ways You Can Give To Others (For FREE)
description:
“Whatever your dream is, use it to give your greatest gifts to people who need it and will love it!”

With the holiday season upon us, it can be easy to equate gift-giving with something physical. But there are plenty of gifts that you can give someone that costs nothing but your time and effort! On today's 5-minute Friday, Lewis guides us through the seven gifts you can give to the world for free!

For more go to: www.lewishowes.com/1050

Mel Robbins: The “Secret” Mindset Habit to Building Confidence and Overcoming Scarcity: https://link.chtbl.com/970-pod

Dr. Joe Dispenza on Healing the Body and Transforming the Mind: https://link.chtbl.com/826-pod

Master Your Mind and Defy the Odds with David Goggins: https://link.chtbl.com/715-pod
author: podcast@schoolofgreatness.com (Lewis Howes)
